settings.title: Are your ingredients traceable?
settings.body:
Yes! We believe you should understand what you’re putting in your body and where it comes from. That’s why we made you a handy guide to tell you all about our clean-sourced, traceable ingredients here.

Explore Our Ingredients

settings.title: What kind of testing do you do?
settings.body:
At Bioligent, our products undergo rigorous testing both in-house and through trusted third-party labs to meet our high standards for safety and quality. We always make sure to test for: 

  • Ingredient Integrity: We verify that the amount and potency of each ingredient listed on our labels are accurate.
  • Heavy Metals: We screen for harmful contaminants including lead, mercury, and other toxic metals.
  • Product Purity: We check for potential impurities like E. Coli, yeast, and mold, and certify that our ingredients are gluten-free, dairy-free, organic, and non-GMO before going into production. 
  • Glyphosates: We ensure that our products are free from harmful pesticides through third-party testing.

settings.title: How does my subscription work?
settings.body:
At Bioligent, we want to eliminate all the guesswork on your end — and that includes figuring out when to order a refill. Once you subscribe to one of our products or bundles, we’ll automatically ship your order every 4 weeks (but we’ll always notify you a few days beforehand).

Want to push your next supply back a month or need it quicker? You can rush, skip, or cancel your subscription at any time on your account page.

settings.title: 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee
settings.body: We want you to love Bioligent as much as we do. But if for any reason, you’re not completely satisfied with your first order, we will happily refund you in full, with proof of purchase within 30 days of delivery. To request a refund, shoot us an email at hello@bioligent.com.

settings.title: What if I still have questions?
settings.body: We always strive to be as transparent as possible. So, if you can’t find the answer to any of your concerns on our website, get in touch with us at hello@bioligent.com.
